thread.title: State of Tennessee trolls Lane Kiffin with its own hype video
thread.title_full: State of Tennessee trolls Lane Kiffin with its own hype video

title: State of Tennessee trolls Lane Kiffin with its own hype video
text:
State of Tennessee trolls Lane Kiffin with its own hype video Yeah so, Tennessee fans are still mad about Jan. 2010. Slot to 247Sports Links 
There are plenty of people in Tennessee still sore over the way Lane Kiffin left things in Knoxville after his lone season coaching the Volunteers. So after seeing Lane Kiffin's awkward FAU recruiting hype video go viral, the Tennessee Department of Transportation shot a s winter preparedness video in the style of Kiffin's infamous clip. 
With Kiffin's video, there's a debate about whether he was trying to completely disinterested. But with this TDOT video, there's no doubt that's what they're going for. The weird thing is, despite the TDOT guy's deliberate efforts to be flat, there's still far more bounce in his voice than there was in Kiffin's. Author
